quote: You think it's easy to forget someone who made you look forward to tomorrow... And I hope you never experience convincing a paralyzed heart to keep on beating when it simply wants to die.
quote_letters: YOU THINK ITS EASY TO FORGET SOMEONE WHO MADE YOU LOOK FORWARD TO TOMORROW AND I HOPE YOU NEVER EXPERIENCE CONVINCING A PARALYZED HEART TO KEEP ON BEATING WHEN IT SIMPLY WANTS TO DIE
